responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "804703B4428FC05DFEA77CB372D4AE58", "You there! Got the look of someone who understands the value of good steel! Or maybe you\'re just lookin\' to make somethin\' useful for a change. If you want to learn how to turn useless metal into something that can defend our home, you\'ve come to the right anvil.")
